statements: UPDATE market_data SET closing_price = 100.50 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE market_data SET volume = 50000, closing_price = 120.75 WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOG' AND date = '2022-01-05';
UPDATE market_data SET closing_price = 100.50, volume = 500 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-03-15';
UPDATE market_data SET volume = 1000, closing_price = 150.75 WHERE date = '2022-03-20' AND stock_symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE market_data SET price = 100.25, volume = 500 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE risk_exposure SET exposure_level = 0.75, risk_factor = 3 WHERE symbol = 'GOOG';
UPDATE market_data SET price = 150.50, volume = 500 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE risk_exposure SET exposure_level = 0.75, risk_factor = 3 WHERE timestamp = '2023-05-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE market_trends SET trend_description = 'Updated trend description' WHERE trend_id = 1;
UPDATE risk_exposure SET exposure_amount = 5000.75, exposure_category = 'High Risk' WHERE exposure_id = 3;
UPDATE market_trends SET trend_description = 'Updated trend description', trend_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE trend_id = 1;
UPDATE risk_exposure SET exposure_description = 'New exposure description', exposure_amount = 5000 WHERE exposure_id = 2;
UPDATE trends_in_market_data SET trend_description = 'Upward trend in technology sector' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE risk_exposure SET risk_score = 3.5 WHERE sector_id = 4 AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE trends_in_market_data SET market_sector = 'Technology', trend_description = 'Growing demand for new tech products' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE risk_exposure SET risk_score = 8.5, date = '2023-05-15' WHERE sector_id = 3;
UPDATE MarketData SET price = 105.75 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE RiskExposure SET risk_level = 'Moderate', exposure_amount = 50000.00 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE MarketData SET price = 1050.75, timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 1;
